about_the_game:
This DLC contains a special collection build of Astral Tournament game dedicated to it's 20th anniversary (first published on SEP-23-2002). This is the first game of the Astral games series and the direct ancestor of Spectromancer game.

A magic combat simulator inspired by trading card games. You should summon creatures that will fight on your side and cast various spells to reduce your opponent life to 0. You can play single duels with computer or your friend or take part in the tournament game.

The game contains 65 cards (spells and creatures) divided into 5 magical elements. 20 cards from this set are received by one of the players, another 20 cards of the same total strength are received by the other player. You can't select which cards will you have.
There is a single duel mode (player vs AI), as well as a single-player campaign consisting of 3 leagues of 10 participants (one of which is you). Each league player has one of 6 specializations that give him or her special abilities. And in each next league, these abilities are stronger.

Multiplayer features include LAN play as well as the ability to play together on the same computer (hot-seat). The ability to play through the Internet lobby, which was in the original version, is no longer supported (due to the closing of the game server).
